医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用语音和机器学习自动预测阿尔茨海默病的进展试图弄清楚某人是否患有阿尔茨海默病通常需要进行一系列评估——访谈、脑成像、血液和脑脊液测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Automated-prediction-of-Alzheimers-disease-progression-using-speech-and-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Automated-prediction-of-Alzheimers-disease-progression-using-speech-and-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a383fb-64fa-48ed-a635-5888433aeb38 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:25:06 -0400 Automated prediction of Alzheimer's disease progression using speech and machine learning
非洲血统的人的遗传变异与糖尿病并发症的风险增加有关根据 6 月 25 日发表在《自然医学》杂志上的一份报告，非洲血统人群中常见的一种遗传变异与糖尿病并发症（包括糖尿病视网膜病变）的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Genetic-variation-in-people-of-African-ancestry-linked-to-increased-risk-of-diabetes-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Genetic-variation-in-people-of-African-ancestry-linked-to-increased-risk-of-diabetes-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649eb265-0e59-473c-8858-3adcb1d92af6 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:15:06 -0400 Genetic variation in people of African ancestry linked to increased risk of diabetes complications
植物来源的硝酸盐可降低死亡风险埃迪斯科文大学 (ECU) 的新研究发现，植物来源的硝酸盐与较低的死亡风险相关，而来自动物性食品、加工肉类和自来水等其他来源的硝酸盐则与较高的死亡风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Nitrate-from-plant-sources-linked-to-lower-risk-of-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Nitrate-from-plant-sources-linked-to-lower-risk-of-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ac82563-268c-410d-afc2-c9750c37148e Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:03:20 -0400 Nitrate from plant sources linked to lower risk of mortality
美国卫生局局长宣布枪支暴力是“公共卫生危机”美国卫生局局长维韦克·穆尔蒂 (Vivek Murthy) 宣布枪支暴力是一场公共卫生危机，因为枪支死亡和伤害扰乱了美国的日常生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/US-surgeon-general-declares-gun-violence-e28098a-public-health-crisise28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/US-surgeon-general-declares-gun-violence-e28098a-public-health-crisise28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f3d35d9-bb96-490c-89d8-5eb60a2e9763 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 08:54:30 -0400 US surgeon general declares gun violence ‘a public health crisis’
治疗师学习如何帮助农民应对压力，以免为时已晚每年春天，这里的农民合作社都是希望的中心。农民在这里购买夏季作物的种子和肥料，并寻求最大限度提高玉米和大豆收成的技巧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Therapists-learn-how-to-help-farmers-cope-with-stress-before-ite28099s-too-late.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Therapists-learn-how-to-help-farmers-cope-with-stress-before-ite28099s-too-late.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eb30264-b6df-4647-a8ed-5db1b77ca022 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 08:53:19 -0400 Therapists learn how to help farmers cope with stress before it’s too late
发现超重或肥胖的新遗传倾向研究人员进行了一项病例对照研究，比较小整合膜蛋白 1 (SMIM1) 功能丧失遗传变异纯合子个体与普通人群之间的代谢变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Novel-genic-predisposition-to-being-overweight-or-obese-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Novel-genic-predisposition-to-being-overweight-or-obese-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ac9be02-b9c6-43ef-8ae2-87988eeaf7c3 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 06:13:00 -0400 Novel genetic predisposition to being overweight or obese identified
研究人员发现，黑猩猩寻找具有药用价值的树皮和蕨类植物研究人员研究了布东戈黑猩猩饮食中自我药疗植物的行为和药理作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Chimpanzees-seek-out-tree-bark-and-ferns-with-medicinal-benefits-researchers-discover.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Chimpanzees-seek-out-tree-bark-and-ferns-with-medicinal-benefits-researchers-discover.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1747f2a6-7f2f-4ba7-808e-3f828fe60f41 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 05:34:00 -0400 Chimpanzees seek out tree bark and ferns with medicinal benefits, researchers discover
可穿戴设备显示睡眠模式如何随健康状况变化检查个体睡眠表型随时间的变化，并确定这些睡眠模式或表型的变化是否可以提供有关急性疾病时期的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Wearable-devices-show-how-sleep-patterns-change-with-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Wearable-devices-show-how-sleep-patterns-change-with-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d232e8fe-2d19-4738-a966-6e53735a0279 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 04:49:00 -0400 Wearable devices show how sleep patterns change with health conditions
研究表明肠道细菌在心理弹性和减少焦虑方面的作用研究人员描述了与压力恢复能力相关的脑肠微生物组（BGM）模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Research-shows-gut-bacterias-role-in-mental-resilience-and-reduced-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Research-shows-gut-bacterias-role-in-mental-resilience-and-reduced-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d10a3c7-5f88-4ea1-be05-58a3454c3647 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 04:28:00 -0400 Research shows gut bacteria's role in mental resilience and reduced anxiety
新研究挑战了目前早产儿的做法悉尼大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，与低浓度氧气相比，早产儿出生后不久就给予高浓度氧气可将死亡风险降低 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-research-challenges-current-practices-for-premature-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-research-challenges-current-practices-for-premature-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26407a4b-76d3-43a9-8d28-5025c318ce00 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 02:55:14 -0400 New research challenges current practices for premature babies
